# swisspalmTemp

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/simpar1471/swisspalmTemp/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/simpar1471/swisspalmTemp/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

The swisspalm package is designed to let you retrieve SWISSpalm data programatically from R using headless chromedriver sessions.

## Installation

You can install the development version of swisspalmTemp from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("simpar1471/swisspalmTemp")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example_spalm1}
#library(swisspalmTemp)
input_uniprot <- c("P05067", "O00161", "P04899")
spalm_data <- getSWISSpalmData(c("P05067", "O00161", "P04899"), dataset.value = 1, species.value = 1)
head(spalm_data[1]); head(spalm_data[2]); head(spalm_data[3])
```
